Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: Manchesterl0ver
Reviews.Content: 12th visit hotel gritti palace every year husband travel italy italy always return venice hotel gritti palace hotel changed years ways better ways worse twice grand rooms overlooking grand canal costly venetian rooms decorated grand style view made suggest room overlooking campo hotel well located breakfast terrace overlooking grand canal one wonderful places dinner club del expensive year chose dine front desk helpful interesting like previous comment met dock arrived highly unusual concierges always professional helpful take advantage free boat lido visit beach fee use hotel des pool service housekeeping impeccable one major complaint charge internet service

Reviews.Title: “Location perfect, good value!”
Reviews.Author: Time Travellers' Wife
Reviews.Content: hotel gorgeous water ever public rooms historic lovely always experience guests disappointing room fantastic view looking grand canal watching listening water traffic open windows delightful experience however first old place seriously met anyone help haul bags water taxi stop hotels entrance wasnt moments one water side help guests arriving leaving bags upon shown room immediately became aware air conditioning barely functioning bed comfortable neither us slept particularly well stay several nights due warmth room problem however small sadly outdated bathroom marble sat two large steps room behind odd door cut wall contained tub one handheld shower head toilet bidet squeezed two sides tub small sink small years marble bathroom cigarette smoke odor stale smoke first thing noticed time opened door hung dry overnight bathroom mistake smelled stale smoke next day husbands complaints management met polite sorry paid extremely expensive rates disappointing experience hope others dont make mistake

Reviews.Title: “atlantis hotel”
Reviews.Author: halford17
Reviews.Content: spent three nights hotel gritti wandering venice beautiful city arrived took water taxi hotel 50 euros bit shock id suggest water busses called vaporetti pretty hotel impressive walk lobby unfortunately room bit larger large bathroom ended two small twin beds reminded teenage years bathroom nicely laid large pretty good shape although towel charm concierge desk helpful overall service hotel great watch expensive room service 18 euros fruit bowl although overall experience wasnt bad id expect lot hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location and good value for money”
Reviews.Author: kathyandian
Reviews.Content: hotel without doubt best venice might say hotel worth money stay gritti dont complain price hotel lobby quaint nice venetian rooms good size beautiful furnished beautiful antiques doubt highlight three night stay restaurant however best food ever eating last two nights stay anyone put reviews ignore would hesitate stay dream hotel returning soon

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: anne00Bristol
Reviews.Content: excited returning venice gritti 7th visit unfortunately last stay gritti booked grand room large marble bathroom room first floor directly across elevator furniture venetian style fine however easy chair awful worn certainly didnt go anything else room ac ventilation large marble bathroom cannot adjust rooms thermostat concierge staff still best cannot say reception bar service fine quality drinks horrible give bad name

Reviews.Title: “Central place , Near for Business traveller”
Reviews.Author: maneeshved
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel location good heart venice building good looking staff ok however one would expect much larger rooms palace rates simply outrageous eg basic breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location!”
Reviews.Author: Ozzie1703
Reviews.Content: stayed gritti number times years hotel great many hotels venice good better cheaper hotel old reputation longer floor fake wood replace old

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Ammenities”
Reviews.Author: nccruisin
Reviews.Content: 2 couples visited venice fall chose gritti palace several reasons starwood property although paid rooms top dollar still received starwood points another reason pictures starwood brochure well numerous travel website recommendations say location grand canal absolutely gorgeous hotel may palace longer lobby small well appointed staff gracious paid us dollars per night rooms best favor stay another property drink canal restaurant definitely worth money especially price weekend fall

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: SueNY60
Reviews.Content: traveled us last stop lobby nice front desk person want experience real old style hotel one refurbishment way 5 star hotels old style ambience great holiday room several free management restaurant food compare meals hotel de paris equivalent star visiting venice hesitate place

Reviews.Title: “Gem near Las Ramblas”
Reviews.Author: Missdanyell
Reviews.Content: stayed gritti palace two nights january going book venetian room opted grand delux larger room totally honest room expected stayed many 5 star hotels good idea expect however room large clean nicely furnished something missing feel lavish lacked character feel age history room hoping floor wood something similar expected bathroom clean dated definitely expect five star thought got really good deal paying 810 euros two nights photos hotel website furnished rooms would need paying lot expect standard rooms rest hotel fantastic cannot faulted lavish staff friendly helpful drinks food expensive expected five star hotel although 55 euros menu bit excessive pasta burger ice cream arrived private water taxi hotel cost 100 euros would recommend lovely way arrive hotel right grand canal impressive sights overall fantastic time venice wonder place gritti palace lovely hotel great location hoping fantastic room stay would pay much wanted something really lavish

Reviews.Title: “Nothing fancy, but reasonable value for price paid”
Reviews.Author: SunDiego123
Reviews.Content: idea people go 5 star hotel one expensive cities italy complain pay 100 per plate nicest restaurant 30 restaurant water around 800 per night beautiful room huge balcony overlooking square side building including partial water view staff extremely polite 6 nights many new name heart time left wonderful hotel wonderful staff definetly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Keep away from that place !”
Reviews.Author: Timur S
Reviews.Content: location best venice staff excellent parts hotel bit tired business services lacking brochure breakfast terrace magical would agree 100 euros couple breakfast magic quite level charging 20 euros french room service

Reviews.Title: “Location saves this hotel ...”
Reviews.Author: Lea B
Reviews.Content: 700 night expected top notch service disappointed think reason great opinion reviews rooms ancient section facing canal though somewhat shabby new section furnished like motel face canal wall building room none immaculate well also concierge indifferent gritti

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Debbie S
Reviews.Content: really good hotel friendly staff great buffet breakfast great location visit city room nice double glazing shutters windows sleep leaving us refreshed

Reviews.Title: “Don't ask questions, otherwise ok”
Reviews.Author: lubelle4
Reviews.Content: 3 night stay city break perfectly located hotel whole city near transport hub plaza catalunya top ramblas previous within walking distance city sights even near restaurants bars shops room comfortable double glazed front traffic noise well equipped safe hair dryer tv toiletries although bit cheap would ok emergency clean comfortable beds extra pillows although rained every day pretty chilly hotel warm staff friendly polite breakfast good read previous reports bit however plenty fresh pastries bread continental style plus fresh fruit fruit even hot sausage bacon etc help satisfied breakfasts able leave luggage leaving city mid afternoon checking 12 noon would recommend hotel city break sure could found cheaper think location us lot taxis bus fares etc even managed get back hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very well located, good breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: Brookycookie
Reviews.Content: hotel great location easily local quiet lots decent restaurants walked every

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location”
Reviews.Author: mickjulieandlucy
Reviews.Content: stayed one night march hotel great location near top end las ramblas square really good transport links shopping areas travelled two couples tried see many sights could foot las ramblas really busy place bottom end near port rather liked experience okay daytime port well worth walk around taxi familia old town 6 euros worth would rather long walk la market las ramblas fantastic gets busy eating problem plenty tapas bars choose hotel comfortable excellent value money paid twin room breakfast room basic comfortable toiletries bathroom breakfast continental enjoyable however us location couple minutes walk top end las ramblas square would definately recommend hotel barcelona busy city warned pickpockets kept us therefore experience feel something travellers take seriously would return great city break

Reviews.Title: “Great location in a great city”
Reviews.Author: giannismaria
Reviews.Content: hotel clean breakfast plenty choice within walking distance ramblas buses take please warned pick pockets money small rest safe get conversation may travelers thought done well nothing five days last day waiting payed transfers airport hotel got caught local barcelona taxi said come take us airport took us 35 euro locked luggage till payed barcelona lovely city spoiled

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place for Touring Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: EasyWalker
Reviews.Content: stayed july hotel centrally located airport train station near lots attraction las ramblas walking distance place staff good breakfast fantastic

Reviews.Title: “location, location!”
Reviews.Author: ajie
Reviews.Content: en royale en de van hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly located for City visit”
Reviews.Author: AlexvdV
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights prior cruise hotel perfectly located 2 metro stations placa catalunya easy walk las ramblas also short cut side street right block toward placa catalunya local food awesome hotel great breakfast included hot cold items great coffee cava morning nice rooms clean adequate size street side small balcony read reviews street noise experience slept well night comfortable beds also computer bottom stairs complimentary nice able make couple back home without fee guest services friendly enough made several computer prior trip questions always answered promptly paid 3 nights barcelona pretty good would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location. Fabulous price and room!”
Reviews.Author: HRHLizzi
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights three star hotel opinion difference one four star hotel smaller reception area room small american standards adequate size floors beautiful large bathroom good breakfast included location walk almost anywhere staff friendly extremely helpful giving directions nothing could better price

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location”
Reviews.Author: purple_swb
Reviews.Content: three rooms family cruise room different clean modern beds comfortable linens good bathrooms large location convenient ramblas placa del catalunya well neighbourhood shopping restaurants breakfast offers good selection early flight offered make staff friendly helpful negative noticed lack soundproofing although much kept us awake even facing front street would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “It's all about location, ambiance and staff”
Reviews.Author: T-2SanDiego
Reviews.Content: stayed one night precruise three nights plus side reviewers mentioned location convenient placa catalunya ramblas metro wifi free breakfast good room amenities included small shampoo body wash hair dryer weak inroom safe minibar negatives front desk staff helpful restaurant suggestions transportation tips others minimum room faced main street noisy people hours trash delivery early morning room small dark clean overall good value euros especially free breakfast find barcelona however think might try different

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: Tualie
Reviews.Content: aware keep distance small smelly rooms noisy hear everything happens street corridor room around theres sound could sleep night whole hotel damp old smells bad

Reviews.Title: “Best money can buy in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Mustaine2011
Reviews.Content: wasnt located walking distance plaza catalunya rambla plaza wouldnt reccomend building old hasnt properly renovated everything dated beds bathroom breakfast good even easy get hotel take plaza 3rd stop walk couple convenient

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION, GREAT VALUE, DECENT ACCOMMODATION”
Reviews.Author: gemandali
Reviews.Content: hotel atlantis located within easy walking metro distance tourist destinations hotel spaces spotless room twin beds nice size bathroom tub shower air conditioning flat screen tv hardwood floors pleasant decor room quiet street noises noises rooms hotels breakfast buffet well stocked wide variety choices meats cheeses yogurt variety cereals eggs toast rolls croissants jams juices coffee fruits etc lift locked room need store luggage checkout front desk staff helpful directions restaurant suggestions felt good value money

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice breakfast, reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: larou25
Reviews.Content: hotel good location top ramblas short walk 8 minutes room clean good breakfast desk staff left much desired pretty much trained check dont expect much could tell much would cost make local call using room phone got two different answers neither correct ended going hotels questions answered day person better two good value dont ask many questions may get accurate answer

Reviews.Title: “Superb location. Friendly and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: timmy9765
Reviews.Content: extremely good location next plaza gracia rambla good size room comfortable bed clean quit windows internal courtyard good breakfast conclusion excellent value hotel explore

Reviews.Title: “For a short city break, it fits the bill”
Reviews.Author: MichaelGreen
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights found extremely convenient centre exploring city barcelona took advice asked inside room although view quiet peaceful breakfast good silly chairs breakfast room wont go tables make difficult move around however would recommend hotel short stays

Reviews.Title: “Everything you would expect from a 3* hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: JJS2010
Reviews.Content: hotel decent clean nothing wonderful ie location perfect las ramblas next placa de lots clothing shops restuarants around hotel room cleaned everyday towels changed daily aerobus airport stops 5min walking distance hotel free internet although one pc chair stand using breakfast ok nothing wonderful

Reviews.Title: “Very Good 3 Star hotel/ Great location”
Reviews.Author: BillPaul
Reviews.Content: loved hotel perfect location ramblas get around town clean great staff would certainly go back

Reviews.Title: “Adequate bang for your buck, but lacking in charm and comfort.”
Reviews.Author: niconekoko
Reviews.Content: got great deal double room bookingcom arrival room spotless thoroughly cleaned day also effective quiet aircon safe priced mini bar aware hair dryer one boxes attached wall like get local leisure centre fairly useless want actually style hair breakfast included room rate provided got reasonable time plenty choice available free wifi huge bonus real minus point limited selection foreign language tv channels ie bbc world english time spanish simply cannot beat hotels location price level minute two placa catalunya las ramblas foot one word advice careful better still avoid metro mother new mobile stolen bag two minute journey time police station otherwise perfect trip saw numerous people pickpockets keep close eye valuables leave anything hotel safe

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice rooms, good staff”
Reviews.Author: kobibn
Reviews.Content: wife full week room front street side double minimal location top 400 steps 200 steps good size rooms firm beds standard bathroom safe included breakfast included friendly people always able give good advise local issues atm several diner dont go ramblas want good value go one many small streets still walking distance many hotels 3 4 stars comparable location city barcelona perfect people want experience barcelona use basis

Reviews.Title: “Great location and middelclass priced hotel”
Reviews.Author: DSK4
Reviews.Content: husband 25 year old son stayed hotel 2 nights prior cruise barcelona port took aerobus airport plaza catalunya walked 35 minute walk road hotel easy even luggage barcelona streets well equipped deal road greeted friendly receptionist checked us fabulous hotel room fifth floor reached 2 lifts bed reasonably comfortable double sofa bed son sleep enough space room bathroom incredible double sink loo bidet enormous bath bath overhead spray handheld shower head foot washing options breakfast good selection cold fresh bread toast various pastries croissants traditional cereals good range juice coffee us included price stay minor gripe price quoted us expedia booked include taxes almost 20 quite shock checkout even extra though easily worth price location location hotel perfect less five minutes plaza catalunya main square place tour buses leave also best place get metro las ramblas also less five minutes walk away mcdonalds burger king hard rock cafe subway starbucks within moments hotel like us prefer authentic spanish menu try exploring small side streets hotel las ramblas cafes restaurants reasonable price

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Convenient Location”
Reviews.Author: supermonchi
Reviews.Content: dont let google street maps put staying looked map thought area bit run right beside plaza catalunya quite small reception area bar restaurant 1st floor free internet access guests reception great help double checking flights staff friendly speak great english arrived early problems leaving luggage coming back later rooms quite big flat screen tv also little balcony room mini bar soft drinks breakfast served till 10am 1030am sunday quite good selection including hot items self service including tea toast overall great hotel city break fantastic location sightseeing tour busses leave road get hotel airport get blue aerobus get stop road hotel street located three roads right hotel 10 buildings right youll see white getting back airport get bus youll get plaza catalunya turn right outside hotel door bus one way return

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Symmy44
Reviews.Content: lucky enough read quite reviews hotel booked location perfect ideal comfortable exploring took airport bus 5th final stop catalunya sq cant miss everyone gets asked driver direction street quite square cut square street want exactly diagonal bus stop hotel short walk didnt need taxi right near 2 metro stops felt safe couple small grocery stores nearby along end eateries excellent value would first choice next time barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Great location - Clean and comfortable room”
Reviews.Author: Sally137
Reviews.Content: location fantastic close plaza behind mall el many many hotels lets say even located plaza closer came good rate others area room gave us big nice king size bed perfect couple small child wanted turn sofa third bed large bathroom 2 sinks large bathtub jacuzzi breakfast services excellent hot choices scrambled eggs sausages bacon cold choices ham cheese plus cereals breads croissants without filling cakes etc really really complete lots choices everything tea juices perfect breakfast suites almost everybody besides breakfast services nothing else hotel room breakfast fit perfectly needs would say perfect 3 stars superior hotel 3 stars hotels supposed 2 stars back barcelona would stay tip ask room located higher floors street noise

Reviews.Title: “A Very Pleasant Surprise!”
Reviews.Author: kawh
Reviews.Content: want say hotel huge surprise think best value money get barcelona position best 2 min walking plaza catalunya la rambla nice clean room huge modern bathroom nice kind receptionists super ok breakfast nice everything stayed past better rated hotels services one fully recommended

Reviews.Title: “Great city hotel in a perfect location!”
Reviews.Author: gemandali
Reviews.Content: returned long weekend 6 girlfriends stayed hotel stayed 2 years ago knew location quality good triple family room 2 single beds sofa bed bit uncomfortable job worth 3 adults sharing room though double rooms fine limited natural daylight due location within hotel rooms cleaned fresh towels daily breakfast great selection warm cold food cereals fruit unfortunately bar doesnt seem open weekends location great 3 mins placa 5 mins la rambla good value money good base weekend city break

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel...but a bit noisy!”
Reviews.Author: Chrystie22
Reviews.Content: husband travelled barcelona 4 days october hotel best part placa catalunya metro station bus airport street wide safe one hotels offer breakfast enough fresh staff hotel friendly helpful rooms spacious clean rooms middle back hotel window opening dead ventilation made us bit uncomfortable go downstairs check weather everyday overall hotel would stay room balcony facing street

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel but noisy.”
Reviews.Author: SAFC08
Reviews.Content: great location easy find reception staff helpful speak good english rooms reasonable size kept clean friendly staff actually speak smile pass corridor wifi free doesnt work throughout building go zone first floor breakfast great get early food seems case gone gone leave long getting

Reviews.Title: “Great Central Location”
Reviews.Author: NornIronMan
Reviews.Content: position atlantis hotel cannot faulted 200 metres five minutes placa catalunya fourth floor room overlooking street surprisingly quiet room perfectly adequate room enough clean nice bathroom reception greatest english speakers im greatest spanish friendly helpful although breakfast room lounge windows functional clean tidy would recommend 1 bus airport placa catalunya 5 euros return 2 tour barcelona good deal 17 euros even interested football 3 visit parc guell free metro interesting gaudi 4 visit sagrada familia 5 spend hour magic fountains front free listening course barcelona best night course best effect romantic great 3 days barcelona expecting ritz dont go atlantis hotel want great location good clean hotel book one good value
